moduleDescription: Major topics to be covered: Asymmetric oxidation e.g. asymmetric oxidation, epoxidation of olefins (Sharpless, Jacobsen, Yang-shi, etc), asymmetric osmylation. Asymmetric reductions e.g. asymmetric reduction of carbonyl compounds, asymmetric hydrogenation, etc. Asymmetric C-C bond formation reactions. Metal-mediated organic transformations Protecting groups in organic synthesis. Selected mechanisms in organic synthesis.
